org.demoiselle.signer.core.extension

Class BasicCertificate

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.demoiselle.signer.core.extension.BasicCertificate

  • public class BasicCertificate
extends Object
    Basic Certificate information based on ICP-BRASIL (PKI) definitions.
    See Also:
    CertificateExtra

      • getNome

        public String getNome()
        Deprecated. spelling mistake, use getName
        Returns the name that was defined on CN for CertificateSubjectDN.
        Its similar to CertificateSubjectDN.getProperty("CN"), but ignoring
        the information after ":".
        Returns:
        String name

      • getName

        public String getName()
        Returns the name that was defined on CN for CertificateSubjectDN.
        Its similar to CertificateSubjectDN.getProperty("CN"), but ignoring
        the information after ":".
        Returns:
        String name

      • getICPBRSubjectAlternativeNames

        public ICPBRSubjectAlternativeNames getICPBRSubjectAlternativeNames()
        Returns the SubjectAlternativeNames of certificate in
        ICPBRSubjectAlternativeNames format.
        If not exists, returns null.
        Returns:
        ICPBRSubjectAlternativeNames subject alternative names
        See Also:
        ICPBRSubjectAlternativeNames

      • getEmail

        public String getEmail()
        Returns the email address that was defined on SubjectAlternativeNames.
        Similar getICPBRSubjectAlternativeNames().getEmail()
        If not exists, returns null.
        Returns:
        String email

      • hasCertificatePF

        public boolean hasCertificatePF()
        Check if the certificate has a "ICP-BRASIL Pessoa Fisica Certificate". DOC-ICP-04
        Returns:
        boolean true if certificate has a "ICP-BRASIL Pessoa Física"

      • getICPBRCertificatePF

        public ICPBRCertificatePF getICPBRCertificatePF()
        Returns data of "Pessoa Fisica" on certificate in ICPBRCertificatePF format
        If its not a "Pessoa Fisica" certificate
        Returns null
        Returns:
        ICPBRCertificatePF Certificate Pessoa Física
        See Also:
        ICPBRCertificatePF

      • getPathLength

        public int getPathLength()
        Returns the PathLength value of Certificate BasicConstraint.
        * 0 - if CA.
        * 1 - for End User Certificate.
        Returns:
        int path length

      • isCACertificate

        public boolean isCACertificate()
        Check if is a Certificate Authority Certificate (ICP-BRASIL = AC).
        * true - If CA.
        * false -for End User Certificate.
        Returns:
        boolean true if CA certificate

      • getCertificateLevel

        public String getCertificateLevel()
        returns the ICP-BRASIL Certificate Level(A1, A2, A3, A4, S1, S2, S3, S4).
        DOC-ICP-04 Returns the null value if the CertificatePolicies is NOT present.
        Returns:
        String Certificate level

      • getAuthorityInfoAccess

        public List<String> getAuthorityInfoAccess()
        Returns the AuthorityInfoAccess extension value on list format.
        Otherwise, returns list empty.
        Returns:
        List Authority info access list
